headline: Burns withdraws from Match Play as groups set for Austin
author: Doug Ferguson
sentences: Cameron Smith (6) withdrew after winning The Players Championship, Hideki Matsuyama (12) is recovering from an upper back injury and Rory McIlroy (8) previously said he plans to play the Valero Texas Open as his final event before the Masters.

Three players moved into the top 64 from their performance last week — Shaun Norris and Dean Burmester in South Africa, Stewart Cink at Innisbrook — but are not eligible.
Sam Burns withdrew from the Dell Match Play on Monday, one day after outlasting Davis Riley in a playoff to become a back-to-back winner at the Valspar Championship.
